title: LastPass
meta_description: A visual helper for the 5 requirements needed for a LastPass master password on their website and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be at least 12 characters long
Must use upper case letters, lower case letters, numbers, and special characters

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Master passcodes that were previously used on your account may be flagged when resetting the master password.
